description:
Urs is a lower class citizen of Seiryuu City and member of the Sewer Rats Guild. Owner of three beast kin girls (later named http://anidb.net/ch92288 [Liza], http://anidb.net/ch92287 [Pochi], and http://anidb.net/ch92286 [Tama] by http://anidb.net/ch91583 [Satou] when he obtains ownership over them). Urs lent his slaves to http://anidb.net/ch95993 [a Zaicuon Temple priest] to help him deceive people and earn money.
Source: Death March Wikia
name: Urs
